TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until Oct 5, Mon to Fri, 11 AM to 3 PM
[4] Service runs every 16 minutes between Burnside Av and Woodlawn in the Bronx
Some uptown [4] trains skip 170 St, Mt Eden Av and 176 St


The last stop for alternate trains from Manhattan is Burnside Av.
• Transfer at Burnside Av to continue your trip.

Uptown trains ending at Burnside Av skip 170 St, Mt Eden Av and 176 St.
• Transfer to a Woodlawn-bound [4] train at 167 St.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA stations.

For service to these stations, take the [4] to Mosholu Pkwy and transfer to a Crown Hts-bound [4].

long_description:
TRACK REPLACEMENT
Until Oct 5, Mon to Fri, 9:45 AM to 3:30 PM
Jamaica Center-bound [J] and Middle Village-bound [M] trains skip Hewes St, Lorimer St and Flushing Av in Brooklyn


For service to these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Myrtle Av and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [J] or [M].

For service from these stations, take the [J] or [M] to Essex St* and transfer to a Jamaica Center-bound [J] or Middle Village-bound [M].

*Transfer at Marcy Av with Unlimited Ride MetroCard.

Alternate travel note:
Take the B46 bus via transfer at Marcy Av or Myrtle Av.

[ad] This service change affects one or more ADA stations.
